meanings.definition: To bring together again after being separated.
meanings.sent1: The family is reunifying after the long journey apart.
meanings.sent2: The team is reunifying for the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces are reunifying to form a complete picture.
meanings.sent4: The scattered clouds are reunifying into a storm.
meanings.sent5: The broken heart is slowly reunifying with hope and love.

meanings.definition: The act of reuniting or bringing back together.
meanings.sent1: The reunifying of old friends brought joy to the group.
meanings.sent2: The reunifying of the country was a cause for celebration.
meanings.sent3: The reunifying of the lost socks in the laundry was a mystery solved.
meanings.sent4: The reunifying of the scattered pieces of the map revealed a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The reunifying of the musical notes created a beautiful harmony.
